description: SINGAPORE - A second professional women's golf tournament will take place in Singapore this year, with the Nov 26-29 Singapore Ladies Invitational making its debut at the Laguna National Golf and Country Club. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Golf: New Singapore Ladies Invitational will offer more chances for local professionals
title_page: Golf: New Singapore Ladies Invitational will offer more chances for local professionals | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - A second professional women's golf tournament will take place in Singapore this year, with the Nov 26-29 Singapore Ladies Invitational making its debut at the Laguna National Golf and Country Club.
The event, founded by Singapore Golf Association (SGA) vice-president Lyn Yeo, is co-sanctioned by the China Ladies' Professional Golf Association (CLPGA) and Taiwan LPGA.
